definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Image distortion correction includes spatial correction and gray-level correction.
sentences.chinese: 图像畸变校正包括空间位置校正和灰度校正。

sentences.english: A rapid rundown in inventories and temporary distortions in credit markets (see article) have not helped.
sentences.chinese: 库存量的快速削减和信贷市场上的临时畸变于事无补。

sentences.english: Both endo-cyclic and exo-cyclic tin atoms are five-coordinated and have coordination geometry of distorted trigonal bipyramid.
sentences.chinese: 内环锡和外环锡原子均为五配位的畸变三角双锥构型。

sentences.english: Sharkskin also has close relation to the interfacial condition between melt and die wall.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼皮畸变的产生与熔体和界面情况密切相关。

sentences.english: The aberration can be emended by adaptive equalization technologies.
sentences.chinese: 自适应均衡可以校正信道产生的畸变。

sentences.english: Criteria for selection, evaluation, and re-evaluation shall be established.
sentences.chinese: 现有两个准则可用来评价谐波畸变。

sentences.english: For cold-ormed lipped channel sections, the distortional buckling mode is often the strength-governing mode among the several possible buckling modes.
sentences.chinese: 但对于冷弯薄壁槽钢而言，畸变屈曲通常起控制作用。

sentences.english: The transmitting image and in the distorting medium are illuminated by the spherical wave.
sentences.chinese: 待传输图象和畸变介质都用球面波照明。

sentences.english: The dependence of fluorescence peak-frequency on the excitation wavenumber indicates the continuous distortion of local crystal field.
sentences.chinese: 荧光峰随激发波数的变化表明局部晶场的连续畸变。

sentences.english: The effect is termed harmonic distortion .
sentences.chinese: 这种作用就称为谐波畸变。

sentences.english: The filter is able to remove shifting components without distortion of ST-segment in ECG.
sentences.chinese: 这种滤波器能在去除漂移的同时不使ST段发生畸变。

sentences.english: In this paper a theoretical studies on the harmonic generation of phase aberrated laser is presented for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次在理论上研究了位相畸变激光束的谐波转换。

sentences.english: A rapid rundown in inventories and temporary distortions in credit markets have not helped.
sentences.chinese: 库存量的快速削减和信贷市场上的临时畸变于事无补。

sentences.english: Now that looks like a brief aberration.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来，这只是短暂的畸变。

sentences.english: They are also pretty much free of any colour aberrations and vignetting around the edges of the image.
sentences.chinese: 他们也几乎无任何颜色畸变和散色或是带色边。

sentences.english: The improved spring-electrode witha silver globule tip diminished the deformation.
sentences.chinese: 改进的弹簧银球电极可以减少畸变波形。
